roleset.name: to move or proceed hurriedly
roleset.note: SCAMPER-V NOTES: Member of Vncls run-51.3.2. (from scamper.01-v)

example.name: with direction
example.text: His characters practically scamper through a vast range of human emotions , like travelers doing 10 cities in eight days .
example.arg: through a vast range of human emotions
like travelers doing 10 cities in eight days
